section.section:
When a corporate document is filed with it, the State Department of Assessments and Taxation shall:
Endorse on the corporate document the time and date the corporate document was received; and
Examine the corporate document.

If, after examination, the State Department of Assessments and Taxation determines that the corporate document is proper, the State Department of Assessments and Taxation shall:
Issue a certificate of approval;
Include with the certificate of approval a copy of the corporate document; and
Record a copy of:
The corporate document; and
The certificate of approval.

text.section:
When the State Department of Assessments and Taxation issues a certificate of approval under this section:
The corporate document is effective;
The district exists as provided in the corporate document; and
The corporate document is conclusively presumed to have been adopted lawfully.
